title: Moontorn
description: It began with the most confusing kiss of her life. It broke free something so much more…Isa’s tying to her Varúlf alpha is the big event of the season – for the handful of her friends that dare attend. For Gwynne, the night is at once thrilling and concerning. Partying with the monsters her parents warned her about? Perfectly reasonable. The unbelievably rude Varúlf that can’t keep his hands off her? That’s a kind of trouble she’d love to be able to avoid.Atlas, burdened with his own demons, can’t for the life of him figure out why he is even attracted to the witch who kissed him once, then ran from him. When a chance pops up to see her again, he grasps it with both hands, determined to get over this silly infatuation. When Gwynne’s shielded home town is miraculously found and attacked, the Ridgewood coven and the Clearlake pack have to team up to save not only their loved ones, but their entire future. The plot thickens in this thrilling, fast-paced sequel to Moontied, starring the series' most unlikely couple. The ties these two isolated communities will form may just about ensure their survival.​Tropes: Shifter/Werewolf Romance, Witch Romance, Early Attraction, Snarky Hero, Sassy Heroine, Soul Bonds, Steamy Romance, Idiots to Lovers, Only One TentHeat level: 3/4 ChilisTags: Third Person Dual POV, themes of kidnapping, violence by and to third parties, bodily harmComing Spring 2022
author: Camille Dwight
